Title: 35809 - Dream Vacation: Planning a Trip to Paris With Your Girls
Direction: 500 words. Give 3-6 helpful tips to women for planning a girl’s trip to Paris. You can give advice on which areas are the best to stay in, where to shop, what to eat, sites to see, etc. Make sure your tips are written for group travel, and include things that would be fun do with friends, rather than solo. The placement site for this article is geared towards women, so write with them in mind. You can link to your target URL in a section that gives advice on picking the right hotel for your group of best girlfriends. Please include the target URL as the first or second link in this piece. Please also make sure the anchor text is natural and not an exact match.

Title: 35810 - How to See Paris on a Budget
Direction: 500 words. Create a list of 3-6 ways that someone could see Paris while on a budget. Traveling can be expensive, but that doesn’t mean that there’s not a way to get the full French experience without forking over your entire life’s savings. Talk about things like getting a deal on a great hotel to save some cash, or give a list of activities and sites you could see for free while there. You can also talk about deals for flights or give advice on how to save up for a big trip like this. You article will be placed on a site that is geared towards those interested in travel, so write with this audience in mind. You can link to your target URL when discussing booking a great hotel. Please include the target URL as the first or second link in this piece. Please also make sure the anchor text is natural and not an exact match.
